# Plan Product (ENTRY)

Read:
- `agent-os/agents/product-planner.md`
- `agent-os/agents/architect.md`
- `agent-os/standards/*`
- `agent-os/vision/*` (existing material, if any)

Do:
1) Ask up to 10 concise discovery questions (audience, outcomes, constraints, risks).  
2) Draft or update **Vision, Mission, Personas, Capabilities, Roadmap** under `agent-os/vision/` (output full file contents).  
3) List 3 architecture options + tradeoffs and recommend one; note standards deltas.  
4) Suggest running `agent-os/commands/write-spec.md` next.  
**No code.**
